name: Ken Fussner
body:
#Hello
My name is Ken Fussner, and I'm just getting started here. I'm a software engineer by trade, and thus am ever exploring cool new ways of doing the same exact thing. While that may make what I do sound superfluous, it is actually quite enjoyable and beneficial in many ways.
  
My purpose here is mostly to explore the land of [GitHub Pages](https://help.github.com/pages), which is where this site is hosted. It also serves as a mini-repository (_diary_ if you will) to document some of the things I've done along the way, as we all forget things and need somewhere to find them.
  
 Cheers!
 Ken
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
